name: Developing
description:
Developing

Play as a child with a polaroid for a head. Together you will reveal her past, struggle to let go and, hopefully, move on. It's time to start developing...

This game was made for the Global Game Jam 2022 - Netherlands bracket - under the theme DUALITY, in 48 hours.

Controls
  • Start the game - ENTER
  • Sideways movement - A & D (or the side arrows)
  • Jump - SPACE
  • Climb - W
  • Restart level - R
Our team
  • Daniela Machado - https://crypticat.itch.io
  • Guilherme Pereira - https://kob-gp.itch.io
  • Pedro Godinho - https://fowlron.itch.io
  • Renata Candeias - https://bilheteira.itch.io
  • Sónia Costa - https://sonia-costa.itch.io

We are part of a college game dev group - Game Dev Técnico. You can find us at itch.io, facebook and twitter!
